meanings.definition: Relating to the branch of astronomy that deals with the physical properties of celestial bodies and the universe as a whole.
meanings.sent1: The astrophysical research team studied the stars and planets in the galaxy.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use astrophysical theories to understand how galaxies form.
meanings.sent3: The astrophysical conference had astronomers and physicists discussing cosmic mysteries.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an astrophysical puzzle, full of unknown dimensions.
meanings.sent5: The astrophysical phenomena in space are both beautiful and complex.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the physics of celestial bodies and the universe.
meanings.sent1: The astrophysical measurements helped calculate the mass of the black hole.
meanings.sent2: Studying astrophysical phenomena requires advanced telescopes and instruments.
meanings.sent3: The astrophysical equations were so challenging that even the brightest minds struggled.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as vast and mysterious as the astrophysical universe.
meanings.sent5: The astrophysical forces at play in the cosmos are truly awe-inspiring.
